languages.text: "Кому угодно". {n}Клеменциа отвечает с горькой усмешкой.{/n} "По мнению других правящих домов мы занимаем наше место незаслуженно, и многие избавились бы от нас при первой возможности. Избавиться и получить возможность управлять тем, что больше не будет нам принадлежать — как минимум, флотом и логистикой".

traits.locale_text: "Кому угодно". {n}Клеменциа отвечает с горькой усмешкой.{/n} "По мнению других правящих домов мы занимаем наше место незаслуженно, и многие избавились бы от нас при первой возможности. Избавиться, значит, получить возможность взять в оборот и управлять тем, что больше не будет нам принадлежать — как минимум, флотом и логистикой".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."
languages.original_text: "Кому угодно". {n}Клеменциа отвечает с горькой усмешкой.{/n} "По мнению других правящих домов мы занимаем наше место незаслуженно, и многие избавились бы от нас при первой возможности. Избавиться и получить возможность управлять тем, что больше не будет нам принадлежать — как минимум, флотом и логистикой".

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really." {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would have gotten rid of us at the first opportunity — and gain the ability to control that will no longer be under our control — the fleet and the logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really." {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would have gotten rid of us at the first opportunity — and gain the ability to control that will no longer be under our control — the fleet and the logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really." {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would have gotten rid of us at the drop of a hat—and gain the ability to control that will no longer be under our control: the fleet and the logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really." {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would have gotten rid of us at the drop of a hat—and gain the ability to control that will no longer be under our control: the fleet and the logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「誰でも考えられる、というのが正直なところです」{n}クレメンティアは苦笑して答える。{/n}「他家は私たちを、今の地位にふさわしくないと考えていますし、私達の所有しているもの…この惑星の艦隊と物流を、己の支配下に置くチャンスとあらば、すぐさま飛びつくことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: 「誰でも考えられる、というのが正直なところです」{n}クレメンティアは苦笑して答える。{/n}「他家は私たちを、今の地位にふさわしくないと考えていますし、私達の所有しているもの…この惑星の艦隊と物流を、己の支配下に置くチャンスとあらば、すぐさま飛びつくことでしょう」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “老实说，每个人都可以得到好处。”{n}克莱门缇雅苦笑道。{/n}“其他家族认为我们德不配位，一有机会就想趁机铲除我们，夺走我们原本控制的部门。至少，他们可以夺走舰队和物流方面的权力。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，每个人都可以得到好处。”{n}克莱门缇雅苦笑道。{/n}“其他家族认为我们德不配位，一有机会就想趁机铲除我们，夺走我们原本控制的部门。至少，他们可以夺走舰队和物流方面的权力。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Honnêtement ? Tout le monde, {n}répond Clémentia avec un petit rire amer.{/n} Les autres maisons nous considèrent comme des parvenus, et beaucoup sauteraient sur la première occasion de se débarrasser de nous afin de prendre le contrôle de la flotte et de la logistique de cette planète. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: « Honnêtement ? Tout le monde, {n}répond Clémentia avec un petit rire amer.{/n} Les autres maisons nous considèrent comme des parvenus, et beaucoup sauteraient sur la première occasion de se débarrasser de nous afin de prendre le contrôle de la flotte et de la logistique de cette planète. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «La verdad es que cualquiera». {n}Clementia responde entre risas.{/n} «Las otras casas nos consideran indignos de nuestra posición y muchos de sus integrantes aprovecharían cualquier ocasión de arrebatarnos el control de lo que en su momento fue nuestro territorio: la flota y la logística del planeta, y probablemente más».
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad es que cualquiera». {n}Clementia responde entre risas.{/n} «Las otras casas nos consideran indignos de nuestra posición y muchos de sus integrantes aprovecharían cualquier ocasión de arrebatarnos el control de lo que en su momento fue nuestro territorio: la flota y la logística del planeta, y probablemente más».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Alle, tatsächlich", {n}entgegnet Clementia mit einem bitteren Lachen.{/n} "Die anderen Häuser halten uns für unserer Stellung nicht würdig und würden uns nur allzu gerne loswerden, um sich zu nehmen, was einst unter unserer Kontrolle stand ... die Flotte und die Logistik des Planeten."
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder, im Grunde." {n}Clementia lacht verbittert.{/n} "Die anderen Häuser halten uns für unserer Stellung unwürdig, und viele würden sofort uns nur zu gerne loswerden. Auch, um zu kontrollieren, was wir bisher kontrolliert haben: Die Flotte und die Logistik."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Doğrusu, herkes olabilir." {n}Clementia, acı bir tebessümle yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Diğer haneler, bulunduğumuz konumu bize yaraştıramıyor. Çoğu da bizden kurtulup elimizdekilere çullanmak için can atıyor. En azından gezegenin filosuna ve lojistik işlerine göz dikmiş durumdalar."
languages.original_text: "Anyone, really," {n}Clementia replies with a bitter laugh.{/n} "The other houses consider us unworthy of our position and many would jump at the chance to get rid of us and gain control over what once was our domain — the planet's fleet and logistics, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrusu, herkes olabilir." {n}Clementia acı bir tebessümle yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Diğer haneler bulunduğumuz konumu bize yaraştıramıyor. Çoğu da bizden kurtulup elimizdekilere çullanmak için can atıyordur. En azından gezegenin filosuna ve lojistik işlerine göz dikmişlerdir."
traits.speaker: Clemence
